Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return PolicyYou may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

CYBERPOWERPC Gamer Master series is a line of gaming PCs powered by AMD’s newest Ryzen CPU and accompanying AM4 architecture. The Ryzen 5 CPU is the core to the series with fast processing speeds and up to 6 cores / 12 threads for effortless multi-tasking. The Gamer Master also includes the latest AMD Radeon or NVIDIA’s GeForce series of graphics cards to deliver high frame rates and impeccable image quality in the newest PC games.
System: AMD Ryzen 5 5600G 3.9GHz 6-Core | AMD B550 Chipset | 16GB DDR4 | 500GB NVMe SSD | 2TB HDD
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 8GB Video Card | 1x HDMI | 2x DisplayPort
Connectivity: 6 x USB 3.1 | 2 x USB 2.0 | 1x RJ-45 Network Ethernet 10/100/1000 | 802.11AC Wi-Fi | Audio: 7.1 Channel | Keyboard and mouse
Special feature: Tempered glass side case panel | Custom RGB case lighting | RGB 7 colors gaming mouse
1 year parts & labor | Free lifetime tech support





About CyberPowerPC:

CyberPowerPC gaming systems are the choice of top gamers everywhere, from pro esports players to pro streamers. However, although it’s used by the best, it’s built for any and every gamer out there. We challenge you to Get On Our Level. Let us give you the tools to take you to top. Every game you dominate, every level you smash, every competition you win, we want to be a part of that every step of the way.

  • Intel Marketing Partner of the Year 2020.
  • Microsoft US Partner of the Year 2020.

CYBERPOWERPC Gamer Master – AMD Series

Enthusiast Level Gaming Computer System

CYBERPOWERPC Gamer Master series is a line of gaming PCs powered by AMD’s newest Ryzen CPU and accompanying AM4 architecture. The Ryzen 5 CPU is the core to the series with fast processing speeds and up to 6 cores / 12 threads for effortless multi-tasking. The Gamer Master also includes the latest AMD Radeon or NVIDIA’s GeForce series of graphics cards to deliver high frame rates and impeccable image quality in the newest PC games.

  • VR Ready with HTC VIVE and Oculus Rift.
  • Optimized for gaming at Ultra High game settings and high resolutions.
  • AMD Ryzen Processor
  • Performance NVIDIA Graphics Processor
  • Wireless 802.11 AC Wi-Fi
  • Gaming Keyboard and RGB 7 Color Mouse Combo

item.title: Beelink Mini PC, AMD Ryzen 5 5600H 6 Core(Up to 4.2GHz), 32GB DDR4 RAM 500GB NVME M.2 SSD, Win 11 Pro Mini Desktop Computer Support 4K@60Hz Output/WiFi 6E/BT5.2/Dual HDMI/Type-C for Gaming/Office/Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) ◆New Upgrade – Mini pc powered with AMD Ryzen 5 5600H 6 Core/12 Thread(3.3GHz up to 4.2GHz, L2 3MB L3 16MB Cache), Radeon Graphics 7 Core 1800MHz. Pre-installed Genuine Win 11 Pro. Which can turn your desk into a powerful workstation just by adding a keyboard and mouse. WiFi 6E(802.11ax) ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $549.00 - $519.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:18:01 UTC – Details)



◆New Upgrade – Mini pc powered with AMD Ryzen 5 5600H 6 Core/12 Thread(3.3GHz up to 4.2GHz, L2 3MB L3 16MB Cache), Radeon Graphics 7 Core 1800MHz. Pre-installed Genuine Win 11 Pro. Which can turn your desk into a powerful workstation just by adding a keyboard and mouse. WiFi 6E(802.11ax) and Bluetooth 5.2 is faster and more stable data transmission and there is no network congestion. More wireless support, say goodbye to cluttered desktop.
◆Triple Screen Display & 4K UHD Output – AMD Radeon Graphics 6 Core 1800MHz delivers powerful graphics processing. Triple screen 4K@60Hz display output via dual HDMI and Type-C port. Enjoy super first-class picture quality and easily improve work efficiency. Fully capable of browsing the internet, using Office, Adobe PR and PS applications, 4K videos playback, etc.
◆Freely Expand Capacity – Mini computer loaded with 32GB RAM DDR4 (2666MHz). Dual channel DDR4 upgradeable to max 64GB(2 x 32GB, up to 3200MHz). And 500GB M.2 SSD NVME 2280 (upgradeable to max 2TB), reading speed up to 1900mb/s and writing speed up to 1700mb/s. Supporting up to 2TB external 2.5-inch 7mm HDD expansion (not included). Reduce latency, powerful loading and processing capabilities for a smoother experience.
◆Multi Interface Design & Meet Deeply Needs – Beelink SER4 small computer is equipped with 2*HDMI2.1 ports, 3*USB3.0 ports, 1*USB2.0 port, 1*Type-C video&data port, 1*DC Jack, 1*RJ45 1000m port, 1*3.5mm Audio Jack(HP&MIC) port. Supports Gigabit Ethernet RJ45 1000M network connectivity. The small pc also can be used for gaming and virtualization work.
◆Keep Desktop Quiet & Tidy – The size of the micro computer is only 5 x 4.5 x 1.6 inches, as palm-size, making minipc more convenient to carry. Installed the pc portable on the back of the monitor via the VESA interface to make it an all in one computer and to make the office cleaner. ABS frame, 2 copper tubes, upgraded aluminum plate and fan design also help this mini pc works better, quiet and efficient heat dissipation. Meet your daily needs for work and entertainment.

Price: $549.00 - $519.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:18:01 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Out of Sight Power

High performance

The OptiPlex 790, now delivers leading-edge technology and versatility to any business environment with the space-saving Micro chassis.

Powerful, bulk storage.

Available with Intel Core CPU, Intel HD graphics, and Intel vPro systems management, OptiPlex 790 enables increased power and productivity.Enjoy your bulk storage device!

Specifications Processor: Intel Core 2nd Gen 3.3GHz Storage: 500GB HDD Optical: DVDRW Port: USB 2.0, DisplayPort, VGA, RJ-45.

Easy integration

Help get the most out of existing IT investments with legacy feature support available on the The OptiPlex 790 like DP port, a VGA port, and an RJ-45 connection.Support Dual display.

Powerful processing and drive options

Select from powerful 4th Gen Intel Core 2nd Gen 3.3 GHz and integrated Intel HD UMA graphics along with other configurable options that let businesses configure the right OptiPlex 790 for each user’s needs.

Rebust storage and memory

The combination of key integrated components allows this computer to excel at work, home or school. DDR3 RAM allows for efficient multi-tasking, and abundant hard drive space provides ample room to store files, apps, music and movies.

Executive-class collaboration

A brand new installation of the Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 64 Language Supports English/Spanish/French Operating System, free of bloatware commonly installed from other manufacturers. As Microsoft’s stablest OS to date, Windows 10 Pro will maximize the utility of your PC for years to come.

Upgrade Bay

The OptiPlex 790 comes with DVDRW drive supports reading and writing DVD data.

Gigabit Ethernet & USB Wi-Fi adapter

The OptiPlex 790 connects to the Internet using a high speed Gigabit Ethernet adapter or stable performance Wi-Fi.

Dell 790 Intel I3 Dual-Core 3.3 GHz Processor

Product Description

ViprTech Snowstorm (AMD) Black

Specifications: CPU: AMD Ryzen 3 2200G (4-Core @ 3.7Ghz Turbo) Graphics: AMD Radeon Vega 8 2GB RAM: 8GB DDR4 Primary Storage: 128GB M.2 SSD (Boot Drive) Secondary Storage: 500GB 7200RPM HDD NOTE:

Prebuilt gaming computer with awesome built-in RGB. This PC is not only a great entry point into PC gaming, it’s also great for everyday use, editing, day trading / crypto trading, and more!

Games tested:

Counter-Strike: Global Offensive Far Cry

Grand Theft Auto V Overwatch

DoTA 2 Rocket League

Fortnite Minecraft

Roblox Team Fortress 2

League of Legends Overwatch

Although we test each build to ensure it can handle most popular games, please check the minimum specs for the specific game you want to play to make sure this computer meets those.

Insane Bootup Times

Take advantage of insanely fast bootup and loading times with the included 128GB M.2 SSD (brand/model may vary).

Built-In Gorgeous RGB Lighting

Light up your rig and showcase your internals with the ViprTech built-in RGB lighting system, a must have for any true gaming PC.

Why choose us?

Affordable

Every PC is designed with affordability in mind, while preserving quality and reliability. Thus, keeping more money in your pocket.

Extensive Testing Process

Before a PC leaves our facility, it goes through a rigorous benchmarking and stress testing process, faulty or underperforming components are identified and replaced.

Made in the USA

Every one of our PCs is hand built by PC experts in the USA, providing jobs to Americans and ensuring we are able to provide the best quality systems possible.

Superior Support

We perform all technical support in-house. No more sitting on hold for hours, waiting in a call queue, or endlessly navigating through phone menu options, if you call you get a real person right away. We believe this is the only way to do it right.

System: AMD Ryzen 3 2200G (3.7GHz Turbo), AMD Radeon Vega 8 Graphics, 8GB DDR4 RAM, 128GB M.2 SSD, 500GB HDD, Genuine Windows 10 Pro, RGB lighting enabled case
Showcase your internals with the built-in RGB lighting system, a must have for any gaming PC and sure to make your rig stand out. Controlled via a button on the case.olled via a button on the case.
Enjoy insanely fast bootup times with the included 128GB M.2 Boot SSD, while still having plenty of storage with the 500GB secondary drive. Easily add additional storage if desired or add more DDR4 RAM (supports up to 32GB) or a dedicated GPU for even better performance
Tested to run games such as: CSGO, Far Cry, GTA V, Overwatch, DoTA 2, Rocket League, Fortnite, Minecraft, Roblox, Team Fortress 2, and many more!
Every ViprTech PC is built by hand in the USA and is stress-tested extensively before shipping. We stand behind our product and include a free 1 year warranty.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Description

Model: Beelink SER5560UProcessor: AMD Ryzen 5 5560U 2.3-4.0GHz, 6 Cores 12 Threads, L2 3MB L3 8MB;Processor Graphics: AMD Radeon Graphics 6core 1600 MHz;OS: Windows 11 Pro 64 bits pre-installed. support Windows 10 and Ubuntu.RAM: 16GB 3200Mhz DDR4 (2 x DDR4 Slots, up to 64GB) ;Disk: 500GB M.2 2280 NVMe SSD (up to 2TB);Extended storage: 2.5 inch 7mm SATA SSD/ HDD, up to 2TB.Thermal Design Power (TDP): 15W~25W;Ethernet: 1 x 1000Mbps LAN ;WiFi: WiFi 6E (802.11ax), Bluetooth 5.2 ;Packages & Accessories: 1 x Beelink SER5 Mini PC, 2 x HDMI Cables, 1 x US Power adapter 19V 3A , 1 x Wall Mounting bracket. 1 x Manual.

Upgrade-Friendly

Gaming

Equipped with AMD Radeon Graphics, Beelink SER5 is also a high-performing gaming PC, can run games at significantly higher frame rates, enjoy the game with friends without hindrance.

Stunning Visuals

Take entertainment to Ultra HD. You can enjoy 4K visuals with the AMD Radeon Graphics or expand your viewing area with 2 displays featuring Dual HDMI Port .

Daily essentials

Beelink SER5 is an affordable and space-saving solution that helps you get work done. Browse the web, check emails, or do word processing as you would on any normal PC.

【High Performance】Powered with AMD Ryzen 5 5560U CPU (6Core/12 threads. 2.3 ~ 4.0 GHz). 16GB DDR4-RAM and 500GB M.2 NVMe SSD Pre-installed with Windows 11 Pro 64bit, automatically activated after connecting to the Internet.Supports Ubuntu and Windows 10.
【Dual 4K output】the SER5 mini PC comes with integrated AMD Radeon graphics 6-core 1600 MHz. 4K@60Hz dual display output supplied via dual HDMI ports that allow you to easily multitasking. Stream 4K video, edit media, work from home or do your homework. Get ready for incredible graphics, sound and performance.
【Large capacity】Installed DDR4 16GB RAM (2x SODIMM slot, can be upgraded to 64GB), installed 500GB M.2 NVMe SSD (up to 2TB) and can expand the storage via 2.5 inch 7mm SATA HDD slot for your personal needs.
【Small and powerful】Easy to set up and configure. Saves desk properties and uses less energy than equivalent alternatives. Metal Frame Design It is widely used for light games, image editing, office applications, media centres, mini servers and much more.
【Other functions and guarantee】Supports RTC wake up/wake on lan/auto power on (BiOS setting)/network boot. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions. We offer lifetime technical support, 2 year worry-free warranty and 24 hours customer service.

Beelink GTR5, With AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX CPU, CPU core with 7th generation processing technology, 8C/16T, all performance can surprise you, let technology change life and improve happiness!

Wi-Fi 6E+ BT5.2

WiFi 6E – low latency and high data throughput to enhance your gaming experience and keep your computer running while completing arithmetic-heavy data calculations.

Blue tooth – transmit and receive more data at faster speeds, with low power consumption and time-limited data communication for more efficient connectivity.

Choose the highly intelligent Beelink GTR5 5900HX Mini PC, which is faster and more durable. Get a Mini PC with a difference!

Genuine W11

Windows 11 has a new Start Menu and Taskbar experience, a multi-window capture layout that allows users to view their Microsoft information on the desktop, a new App Store for installing your favorite apps, games, movies, a Bluetooth audio experience with Widgets widgets, an open ecosystem, storage health monitoring, a virtual desktop experience, and an improved Bluetooth audio experience…

And much more!

New interface, simple and efficient

For a smart office, choose the Belink GTR5-5900HX

Dual 2.5G RJ45

The dual 2.5G RJ45 propagates at a faster speed of 2500Mbps, with a network transmission rate Around 300MB/s. It can be used in a wider range of environments, not only at home, in the office, on high speed trains, but also in high speed broadband and in the natural environment, achieving the “freedom to work” and reducing environmental constraints. The freedom to work and to reduce environmental restrictions.

Less obstruction and less time wasted. Let the Beelink GTR5 5900HX give you more freedom!

Dual DMIC hole language control

With the perfect use of artificial intelligence language, you can listen to your needs more clearly and precisely, set the language in the system, “communicate” with the computer, free your hands, use the computer at busy times and maximise your work efficiency, making your work easy and fun.

Beelink GTR 5 is inviting you to “chat”, please accept!

Keeping comfortable environment

With Beelink’s exclusive large fan and special material treatment, you can keep the program running steadily while making little noise, so you may not notice the noise and maintain a comfortable office environment, even when working late at night without worrying about disturbing the sleep of your family and small pets.

Super Mini and Portable

Space saving, portable, and easy to install, the Mini comes with a power cable, and two HDMI cables (1*long, 1*short) that can be carried in a backpack, if you travel a lot, I believe the Beelink GTR5 will be a good choice for you.

Save more space

Easily hold the Beelink mini tabletop in the palm of your hand. It doesn’t take up much space, it comes with a VESA bracket that can be hung on the back of your TV or easily installed, making it easy to clean your desk, reducing the footprint and keeping it neat and tidy.

The Beelink GTR5 5900 is with you every minute of every day and listens carefully to your needs.

【Mini PC AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX running score】Beelink GTR5 with AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX (8C/16T up to 4.6Ghz), Which on the Cinebech R20 can reach 4315 for multi-core and 528 for single-core, a strong performance that makes it run smoothly in both design and gaming applications.
【Flexible Expansion Options】 Beelink GTR5 Mini Computers Equipped Windows 11 Pro, 32GB DDR4 3200 MHz memory, which can configurable memory to 32GB of a single card and 64GB of a dual card. And equipped with 500GB, read speed up to 2038MB/S, and is scalable to 2TB storage.
【Beelink MIni PC 4K Triple Display】Beelink GTR5 with 1 DP, 1 HDMI, and a Type-C output port, you can connect multi-monitors at the same time, which helps you improve working efficiency and greatly save your time. And GTR5 has a built-in dual microphone. The dual microphones form a microphone matrix for more accurate recognition of your voice.
【Small and Powerful】Base Clock 3.3 GHz, up to 4.6 GHz, which provides a faster response speed under high load reduces heat and extends battery life under low load. It is widely used for Photo Editing, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Audio Production, Software Development, STEM. The fingerprint recognition function makes your use more convenient and your computer more private.
【Good After-sale Service】Free And Reliable Lifetime after-sales Service,All products are FCC, ROHS, CE certification. We also offer 3 years of factory professional support and 7*24 hours online customer service.
